channel.title: Range/Mage Problems
channel.description:
Well hello guys =D another problem of mine xDD well when someone create an acc... it will be added in the inventory 5k bronze arrows.. and when some one wield it and shot in some npc's, the arrows in the inventory will never lose... example : I have 5000 arrows in my bag, i shot 100 in npc's, but it stays in 5000 arrows... and theres another problem... my members says that is annoying buying arrows and runes 1 each of the time... i wanted to put the "X" for them to buy whatever the number of runes and arrows they wanted... how do I fix that ? I really Apreciate your help ^.^ sorry for my bad english cuz I'm portuguese =D
Cumpz all =D

item.title: Range/Mage Problems
item.dc:creator: @Balazyo94 Balazyo94
item.description:
@Balazyo94 wrote:

Well hello guys =D
another problem of mine xDD
well when someone create an acc… it will be added in the inventory 5k bronze arrows… and when some one wield it and shot in some npc’s, the arrows in the inventory will never lose…
example :
I have 5000 arrows in my bag, i shot 100 in npc’s, but it stays in 5000 arrows… and theres another problem…
my members says that is annoying buying arrows and runes 1 each of the time… i wanted to put the “X” for them to buy whatever the number of runes and arrows they wanted… how do I fix that ?
I really Apreciate your help ^.^
sorry for my bad english cuz I’m portuguese =D

Cumpz all =D
